description: I'm a Waterloo based Software Engineering Student. I have just completed the 3rd year of my Bachelors in Software Engineering at the University of Waterloo, and am currently on co-op in Cupertino, CA.

education.major: Honours Software Engineering, Co-operative Program, Business Option
education.description: Studied Nanotechnology Engineering from 2014-2016 prior to transferring to Software Engineering in the fall of 2016.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern, FaceTime Engineering Team
Game Programmer Intern, Game Engine Team
work.description: Implemented low-level performance optimizations in a large C++ game engine for a AAA game.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern, Agent & Integrations Team
work.description: Worked on the DataDog Agent 6, implementing new features as well as improving the performance of existing components.

work.company: University of Waterloo Faculty of Engineering
work.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant
work.description: Optimized the security, performance, and reliability of a web system in order to effectively increase web app scalability.

work.title: App Developer
work.description: Designed & built a cross-platform web app that students and staff at the University of Waterloo can use to interface with the autonomous shuttle being developed by the Autonomoose team.

projects.title: 3D Rendering Engine
projects.description: Dynamic 3D scene navigable as a 1st-person character, rendered in C++ via direct interfacing with the OpenGL API. Features include custom GLSL shaders implementing Phong model, 3D model loading & terrain generation via heightmaps.

projects.title: Mini RPG
projects.description: 2D adventure game written from scratch complete with combat & asset acquisition mechanics. Built in multithreaded C++ using SFML as an environment for OpenGL.

projects.title: Retro Games
projects.description: A small collection of retro arcade games created with HTML5 Canvas & JavaScript.

projects.title: Transcript Visualizer
projects.description: Node.js app that uses D3 to display a UW transcript as a dendogram.

projects.title: NatalNet
projects.description: SMS and web app that increases the accessibility of pre- and post-natal care for women in rural communities of Bangladesh.
awards: Break Inequality Hackathon Grand Prize Winner

projects.title: NutriFence
projects.description: IPhone app for people with dietary restrictions which uses OCR to scan food labels and determine if an item is suitable for their diet.

projects.title: Word Switcher
projects.description: Small Chrome extension for replacing a choice word in your browser.

projects.title: Personal Websites
projects.description: Over the years, I used the creation of an online personal portfolio as a means to learn web development. I started with only the bare minimum tools to ensure I fully understood the fundamentals of web technology, & then slowly incorporated more complex tools over time.

versions.description: A single page React.js site based off of https://github.com/tbakerx/react-resume-template.
A single page portfolio built from scratch with Bootstrap, jQuery and SASS; featured custom animations & a custom parallax scrolling background.
A single page portfolio built from scratch with HTML5, CSS3 and jQuery.
A multi-page portfolio built from scratch with only HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.
